
-- Apr 2010 --

PACKAGE: OGDI
VERSION: 3.1.5
URL: http://ogdi.sourceforge.net/
     http://sourceforge.net/projects/ogdi/files/

Compile instructions:
1. Open the ogdi-3.1.zip file from the third_party\zips directory.
2. Open VS2008 solution from root directory.
3. Following instructions on Wiki:
   https://www.pyxisinnovation.com/pyxinternalwiki/index.php?title=How_to_compile_GDAL
4. To compile this package you must unzip PROJ zips files.
